compatibility.caption: Compatible – El comportamiento del juego es coherente con Nintendo Switch.

Product:{\"sku\":\"7100085232\"}.name: Medieval Fantasy: Jigsaw Puzzle
Product:{\"sku\":\"7100085232\"}.description({\"html\":true}):
The intuitive interface and relaxing music will create ideal conditions for you to focus on the exciting task of composing magnificent, colorful images in the style of medieval fantasy. You will find a variety of stories: from graceful ladies in luxurious outfits and brave warriors to majestic dragons, medieval castles and powerful wizards.

Drag and drop elements, combine them into groups or sort them by color - everything, just like in real life. Collect puzzles, opening increasingly complex images.

Features:
• Realistic imitation of assembling a real puzzle
• The ability to examine the image in detail after assembly
• Simple and exciting game mechanics
• Gradually increasing difficulty of puzzles
• Music conveying the atmosphere of the Middle Ages
Product:{\"sku\":\"7100085232\"}.disclaimer:
Se requiere una suscripción a Nintendo Switch Online (se vende por separado) para utilizar la función de guardado de datos en la nube.

© 17Studio LLC.
